summary: all for one, teaching math to Shigaraki: Okay, so if I have one dollar, and my friend gives me another dollar, how many dollars...
body:
all for one, teaching math to Shigaraki: Okay, so if I have one dollar, and my friend gives me another dollar, how many dollars do I have?

shigaraki: Master, you don’t have friends.

summary: When I first read Bnha I read Uraraka as just Uraka, and I still read it with only one ra because it feels more nirmal.  Iida...
question: When I first read Bnha I read Uraraka as just Uraka, and I still read it with only one ra because it feels more nirmal.  Iida was also Lida, because lowercase l and big I are confusing for me.  So for the longest time I was just so confused as to why people were spelling their names wrong everywhere else.
answer: Yeah I’ve seen quite a few people who thought it was Lida. I never made the mistake myself but it’s understandable.

reblog.comment: Yeah I’ve seen quite a few people who thought it was Lida. I never made the mistake myself but it’s understandable.

trail.content: Yeah I’ve seen quite a few people who thought it was Lida. I never made the mistake myself but it’s understandable.

summary: When I first watched bnha I immediately related to Todoroki, then seeing his home life and father son relation ship I felt so...
question: When I first watched bnha I immediately related to Todoroki, then seeing his home life and father son relation ship I felt so fucking called put lmao (I’m doing a maid cosplay of him soon btw ;D)
answer: Yeah I relate to Todoroki so much, his home life was so similar to mine that I immediately fell in love with him after the sports festival arc

blog.name: faketextsfromlastmight
blog.title: Fake texts from last Might
blog.description: Things BNHA characters most definitely never said (sadly).

summary:
Iida Tenya : OH NO!!! This box of orange juice was supposed to cost 150 yen... But the cashier only billed me 120!
Midoriya...
body:
Iida Tenya : OH NO!!! This box of orange juice was supposed to cost 150 yen... But the cashier only billed me 120!
Midoriya Izuku : Well, I'm sure you'll do the right thing.
Iida Tenya : Kill all witnesses of my shameful crime and move to South America?

dialogue.label: Iida Tenya :

blog.name: ao3feed-bakudeku
blog.title: ao3feed-BakuDeku
blog.description:
Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3
Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

title: Kinky and the Beast
description:
by NethWrites

“Please. Please don’t eat me.”

He whispered more to himself, assuming the beast wouldn’t be able to understand him. He assumed wrong.

“Oh I will definitely be eating you up. Don’t worry you will like it, little one.”

Mouth agape and eyes wide open Izuku stared at the beast who was smirking down at him. Maybe he was dreaming? It wouldn’t be the first time, neither the second, for him to have this kind of dream but this felt so much more real than his other dreams. Or maybe the beast had already killed him and this was his own heaven… or hell. Who knows?

Words: 2453, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Midoriya Izuku
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Creatures & Monsters, Monster fuckery, Breeding, Beauty and the Beast Elements, Izuku is a monster fucker, ABO elements, Stomach Bulge
